      Instantiates a new host.
      Parameters:
      id - the id

      containerVmBwProvisioner - the bw provisioner
      storage - the storage
      peList - the pe list
      containerVmScheduler - the vm scheduler

  • Method Details

    • updateContainerVmsProcessing

      public double updateContainerVmsProcessing(double currentTime)
      Requests updating of processing of cloudlets in the VMs running in this host.
      Parameters:
      currentTime - the current time
      Returns:
      expected time of completion of the next cloudlet in all VMs in this host. Double.MAX_VALUE if there is no future events expected in this host
      Precondition:
      currentTime >= 0.0
      Postcondition:
      $none

      Parameters:
      containerVm - the vm
      Returns:

      $none
      Postcondition:
      $none

    • setFailed

      public boolean setFailed(String resName, boolean failed)
      Sets the PEs of this machine to a FAILED status. NOTE: resName is used for debugging purposes, which is ON by default. Use setFailed(boolean) if you do not want this information.
      Parameters:
      resName - the name of the resource
      failed - the failed
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise

    • setFailed

      public boolean setFailed(boolean failed)
      Sets the PEs of this machine to a FAILED status.
      Parameters:
      failed - the failed
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise

    • setPeStatus

      public boolean setPeStatus(int peId, int status)
      Sets the particular Pe status on this Machine.
      Parameters:
      peId - the pe id
      status - Pe status, either Pe.FREE or Pe.BUSY
      Returns:
      true if the Pe status has changed, false otherwise (Pe id might not be exist)
      Precondition:
      peID >= 0
      Postcondition:
      $none
